hints.content:
To find the total height, we can add the $\blueE{\text{Chichen Itza}}$ and $\maroonD{\text{Arc de Triumph}}$ together.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/9454186b9922b24148b85f4d9d95762c2deea5b6)

$\blueE{24}\text{ m}+\maroonD{49}\text { m} = \purpleD{\Box}\text { m} $

Let's add to find the total.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1d4379755cab471d4d7689684855c2c768bbd0d0)

$\blueE{24}\text{ m}+\maroonD{49}\text { m} = \purpleD{73}\text { m} $
The height of the Chichen Itza and Arc de Triumph combined is $\purpleD{73}\text { m}$.

question.content:
The height of different monuments around the world is shown below.

Monument | Height
- | - | -
Statue of Liberty | $92 \text { m}$ 
Chichen Itza | $24\text{ m}$
Taj Mahal | $73 \text { m}$ 
Arc de Triumph |  $49 \text { m}$ 


**What is the height of the Chichen Itza and Arc de Triumph combined?**  

[[â˜ƒ input-number 2]] $\text{m}$
